document_data.name: Rary's Mnemonic Enhancer
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Rary's mnemonic enhancer''''' was a [[transmutation]] spell that was only usable by [[wizard]]s

To [[Zakhara]]n mages, always reluctant to acknowledge [[ajami]] names and accomplishments, the spell was known simply as '''''mnemonic enhancer''''', and counted among the spells of the [[Universal (province)|universal province]].

It allowed one to prepare extra spells or retain one that was just cast, and was presumably developed by [[Rary]].
